    • Method Detail

      • dealerPlay

        public void dealerPlay()
        Make the dealer play according to blackjack rules. The dealer will: always hit when the value of its hand is 16 or lower, and hit when the value of its hand is 17 only when the hand is "soft" (when it has an Ace counted as an 11)

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Handles button presses from the main ui frame. The buttons are: Hit, Stand, and Next
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
